data.title: PressMart - Modern Elementor WooCommerce WordPress Theme
data.meta_description: Buy PressMart - Modern Elementor WooCommerce WordPress Theme by PressLayouts on ThemeForest. PressMart is modern and unique Elementor WooCommerce WordPress Theme. It comes with high-quality 05+ Prebuild Home Pa...
data.text:
PressMart is modern and unique Elementor WooCommerce WordPress Theme. It comes with high-quality 05+ Prebuild Home Pages that fit any online store such as fashion store, electronics store, furniture store, etc.

We used Elementor – a drag and drop page builder that doesn’t require coding skills from the users easily edit and build a new page. PressMart theme is fully responsive. It’s looks great on any device like desktop, tablet or mobile and can be imported quickly with One Click Demo Import.

PressMart theme comes with many ecommerce necessary features for online store like Product Filter, Ajax Search, Ajax Add to Cart, Quick Buy, Bought Together, Mini Cart etc. PressMart can be a great choice for any online store like fashion store, clothing store, furniture store, cosmetics shop, luxury jewelry, and accessories store.

It is a most advanced, ready to use, clean and professional theme. It comes with powerful admin panel which have 450+ options for manage header style, page layouts, typography, etc. So user have no need to coding knowledge for build their store.

Version 1.2.9 is out – JUL 15 2024

WordPress 6.x.x Compatible

WooCommerce 9.x.x Compatible

RTL Language Support

Dokan Multivendor Marketplace Compatible

WC Vendors Compatible

WC Marketplace Compatible

WCFM Marketplace

WooCommerce Frontend Manager

Powerful Ecommerce Features

Ajax search: Enter the a keyword into search box for find the tagged items.

Compare: Put different items together on a detailed full-screen comparison.

Add to wish list: Add an item to your favorite wish list just for better watching.

Off canvas cart: The cart is put off canvas in order to save more space.

Buy Together: Increase your sales with personalized product recommendations.

Size Guide: Size Guide Option for all product.

Multi-Vendor: Fully supported multi vendor plugin(Dokan,Wc vendor,Wc MarketPlace, WCFM).

Modern and Clean design

Highly customizable

Wide & Boxed Layout

WPML Compatible

The PressMart theme can easily be translated by using the po and mo files or you can use WPML Plugin if it needed, So themes is available in your language too.

High Performance

The importance of going up in search result pages and site load speed is clear to everyone; Users will find the crafted and designed with significant attention to bring high speed performance for their website. We made the incredibly speedy and powerful to use.

Sticky Sidebar.

Advance Mega Menu

There is no limitation. Complicated layouts, menu, background, shortcode and anything that you need are ready for you by PressMart theme to design your desired mega menu. Just imagine and then easily design mega menu with Elementor Page Builder.

Advanced Shop

The theme brings full options to build and online store. This theme is Powered by WooCommerce, the most popular eCommerce platform. This theme is based on a modern and minimal design using ajax technology provide a very unique and practical experience to users. This theme is appropriate for all kind of shops like Fashion, Electronics, Furniture, Accessories or any other known kinds.
